body: Why won’t anyone draw Kuja properly? No matter where I go, be it here or Rule 34, It’s always either a Rule 63 version, or an overly-cutesy modern anime art style. The man is plenty cute in his Dissidia depictions. We need a FFIX Remake once VII and hopefully VIII’s remakes are done releasing. By then I’ll probably be an old man with Erectile Dysfunction.
